title: Start your story at Westmont Cove! 2 Bedroom Townhouse coming soon!
posting_body: Start you story at Westmont Cove in Everett, WA!
A beautiful community steps away from local parks, dining, shopping and Everett’s largest employer Boeing!
All Westmont Cove apartment homes come equipped with high efficiency washers and dryers, hardwood flooring, upgraded carpet and real wood burning fireplaces.
Fall in love with our gourmet kitchens featuring slab granite counter tops, under mount stainless steel sinks, lazy Susan's, pantries, and stainless-steel appliances.
Step into the bathroom sanctuary with slab granite counter tops, ceramic tile floors, shower and tub surrounds.
Every home also comes with a private patio and private storage unit perfect to store all the outdoor fun that makes living in the Pacific Northwest the best place to be!
We are ready to do all we can to help you with your home search.
Please call or email us today to see how you can schedule a virtual or in-person tour!
This won't last long, call, text or today!!
•	Flex-pay rent payments, making half-payments at the beginning and in the middle of the month!
*Note images may not be of exact available apartment and may be of similar floorplan.
Contact office staff to schedule a tour!
